0352a39223a9bb7c9d4c66cc673a8324a3e56ea9.query: select id as "id: AgeRangeId", display_name, created_at, updated_at from age_range

09235acdd936537b2a819b15b7aed2df73de16cf.query:
insert into category (index, parent_id, name)
VALUES((select count(*)::int2 from category where parent_id is not distinct from $1), $1, $2)
returning index, id

0978a2ae9cbe0c16d58c15229324bad8325b60d9.query:
update category
set updated_at = now(),
    index = least((select count(*)::int2 from category c where c.parent_id is not distinct from parent_id), $1)
where id = $2

12733111814b439e48d7e9f8ce720e88382a2e0a.query: select exists (select 1 from "user" where id = $1) as "exists!"

1b88f0ec5158d04c34ef416bf283ddfc0d383330.query:
with recursive path(id, index, parent_id) as (
    select id, ord, null::uuid
    from category
             inner join unnest(
            $1::uuid[]) with ordinality t(id, ord)
                        using (id)
    union all
    select c.id, c.index, p.id
    from path p
             inner join category c on (c.parent_id = p.id)
)
select distinct id as "id!",
       path.index::int2 as "index!",
       path.parent_id,
       name,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
       (select count(*) from image_category where category_id = id)::int8 as "image_count!",
       0::int8                                                            as "jig_count!"

from path
         inner join category using (id);

1f8df54bb87c543c4a975eb72c8c981ecd033664.query:
update category
set parent_id = $1,
    updated_at = now(),
    index = (select count(*)::int2 from category where parent_id is not distinct from $1)
where id = $2
returning index

28fb8b1e761b9606fe607a8d42a63d459008846a.query:
with recursive links as
                   (
                       select id,
                              parent_id
                       from category co
                       where id = any ($1::uuid[])
                       union all
                       select co.id,
                              co.parent_id
                       from category co
                                inner join links ct on (ct.parent_id = co.id)
                   )

select distinct id,
       category.parent_id,
       name,
       category.index,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
       (select count(*) from image_category where category_id = id)::int8 as "image_count!",
       0::int8                                                            as "jig_count!"
from category
         inner join links using (id);

39a8d9f6b645305b1a6282c110154c481dcdd211.query: update category set name = $1 where id = $2

4da15c8f7c51da73da193a2fc4ed3c4f889bc0eb.query:
insert into image_metadata (name, description, is_premium, publish_at) values ($1, $2, $3, $4)
returning id as "id: ImageId"

51a40f41372d3ac245973b6c148c56e71684c771.query:
update category
set index = index - 1, updated_at = now()
where index > $1 and index <= $2 is not false and parent_id is not distinct from $3

623992fdf30ce59e4917c9f6638a7b08dcb0141a.query: select id as "id: AffiliationId", display_name, created_at, updated_at from affiliation

65bbbe5cb9eba5f0bf454b10f8b07ccf8eb3f519.query: delete from category where id = $1 returning index, parent_id

7038777fa4cd28dac1759e3b17744192f4cfc0af.query:
update image_metadata
set name        = coalesce($2, name),
    description = coalesce($3, description),
    is_premium  = coalesce($4, is_premium),
    updated_at  = now()
where id = $1
  and ($2 is distinct from name or
       $3 is distinct from description or
       $4 is distinct from is_premium)

837809b203432d774c6ce23f6213712da9101798.query: select parent_id, index from category where id = $1

83c4e421a83eb284ceab3d18858a6c5718d8e2d8.query:
INSERT INTO "user" 
    (firebase_id, display_name, email) 
VALUES 
    ($1, $2, $3::text)
returning id

9baca0e0cc5e462bafb40e834a5c894d9f02dbb6.query: select exists(select 1 from image_metadata where id = $1) as "exists!"

be59835e1d5e12c886bcb449ed6877588ec6e5a8.query: select id as "id: StyleId", display_name, created_at, updated_at from style

c0f2792d2f5f952c0f6becbd49c168ca420c910e.query:
update category
set updated_at = now(),
    index = index + 1
where index >= $1 and index < $2 and parent_id is not distinct from $3

d6d463c1ab277fa41b23c16f3a507d56238f9e48.query:
select id                                                                 as "id: CategoryId",
       name,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
       (select count(*)::int8 from image_category where category_id = id) as "image_count!",
       0::int8                                                            as "jig_count!"
from category
where parent_id is null
order by index

edf5cb94b8714ed9995df1c7266d8837390d3525.query:
with recursive cte(parent_id) as (
select parent_id from category where id = $1
union all
select c.parent_id from category c inner join cte on cte.parent_id = c.id
) select exists(select 1 from cte where parent_id = $2) as "would_cycle!"

fa66e89e6b008f41f95a2489415e76fd57f37f08.query:
select id                                                                 as "id: CategoryId",
       name,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
       (select count(*)::int8 from image_category where category_id = id) as "image_count!",
       0::int8                                                            as "jig_count!"

from category
         inner join unnest($1::uuid[]) with ordinality t(id, ord) USING (id)
order by t.ord

fbfda7ab377cf2ef86027ab43fbb941df005bc72.query:
select id,
       parent_id,
       name,
       index,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
       (select count(*) from image_category where category_id = id)::int8 as "image_count!",
       0::int8                                                            as "jig_count!"
from category

fc6bfe176017b10253bc42ecb9f96f0533953b10.query:
update image_metadata
set publish_at = $2, updated_at = now()
where id = $1 and $2 is distinct from publish_at
